metadata.synopsis: Plaque Narrator AD for a head bust in Gortash's Office
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to Gortash office. - Click on the plaque

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Baldur's Gate ship captain Morgan Redlocks wed a man thrice her age. After the wedding, the groom suffered a heart attack. Redlocks converted his merchant ships into a pirate fleet.*
